subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ma|t=not}}. Cognate with {{och-l|亡|to disappear}}. The level-toned pronunciation has a nominal prefix ''*s-'', ''lit.'' "circumstances associated with disappearance (death)", whereas the departing-toned pronunciation has a formally identical causative prefix ''*s-'' and an exoactive suffix ''*-s'', ''lit.'' "to cause to disappear".

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[mourning]]; [[funeral]] [[ceremony]]
# [[corpse]]; [[dead]] [[body]]
# [[misfortune]]; [[misadventure]]
# to [[mourn]]; to be in [[mourning]]
# to [[grieve]] over the [[death]] of
